Value.label: Auto scene mode set
Value.Help: Activation of the programmed scene changing color shades

Item.label: Ocean (soft flashing between shades of blue colour)
Snow (flowing between shades of white and cyan colour)
Romantic (soft flowing of the red colour)

Value.label: Auto scene duration
Value.Help: Using this parameter, it is possible to change Auto scene mode duration. 1 - 127 delay duration is from 1s to 127s, 1001-1127 delay duration is from 1min. to 127 min. This parameter has no effect on Lightning and Party scene.

Value.label: Memorize device status at power cut

Item.label: Device does not memorize its status at power cut. Load is disconnected
Device does memorize its status at power cut. Load will be set to the status from before power cut

Value.label: Automatic turning off output after set time
Value.Help: Output is turned off automatically after the time set in this parameter. 0 - Auto OFF disabled. 1-32536 seconds auto OFF.

Value.label: Automatic turning on output after set time
Value.Help: Output is turned on automatically after the time set in this parameter. 0 - Auto ON disabled. 1-32536 seconds auto ON.

Value.label: MIN dimming value (%)
Value.Help: 1-98 = 1% - 98% NOTE: The minimum level may not be higher than the MAX dimming value

Value.label: Dimming time when key pressed
Value.Help: 1-127 = from 1 to 127 seconds. NOTE: Dimming time also depends on Min and Max dimming value.

Value.label: Four dimmers mode
Value.Help: NOTE: If the parameter 14 is enabled, parameter 1-4 has no effect. After parameter change first exclude device (without setting parameters to default value) and then re include the device.

Item.label: Four dimmers mode enabled - momnetary switch type
Four dimmers mode enabled - toggle switch type
Four dimmers mode enabled - toggle with memory switch type
